Title: Expands who the director of budget shall report to in regard to the healthcare stability fund
Summary: Expands who the director of budget shall report to in regard to the healthcare stability fund; expands the criteria of reporting requirements.
LawCode: Amd ยง99-rr, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to requiring additional reporting requirements on expenditures related to the healthcare stability fund
